pkgmetadata.longdescription: Normalize Hadamard Matrix // Normalize a given Hadamard matrix. A Hadamard matrix is said to be normalized when its first row and first column entries are all 1, see Hedayat, A. and Wallis, W. D. (1978) "Hadamard matrices and their applications. The Annals of Statistics, 1184-1238." doi:10.1214/aos/1176344370.
